articles.title: WATCH | US tourist's rental car takes a dip in Hermanus Harbour, lifted out by crane - News24
articles.description: The wheels of misfortune spun disaster for one American tourist when his rented vehicle took a dip in the water at the Hermanus Harbour on Friday morning.
articles.content:
• A rental car hired by an American tourist plunged into the water at the Hermanus Harbour.
  • The tourist was collecting his scuba gear from Neptune's Divers and Cruises when the vehicle … [+1931 chars]

articles.title: Taiwan ready to welcome former US secretary of state Mike Pompeo - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Government says it is ‘working hard’ to arrange a visit by the American, who was a strong supporter of the island during his time in office

articles.author: Tyler Lauletta
articles.title: American golfer Xander Schauffele lost $575,000 at the Masters because he and his caddie chose the wrong club - Insider
articles.description: Xander Schauffele's late charge at the Masters fell apart when he pulled the wrong club at the par-3 No. 16. It cost him half a million dollars.
articles.content:
Xander Schauffele once again came oh so close to a major victory on Sunday at the Masters.
Playing in the final pairing with the leader, Hideki Matsuyama, Schauffele began the final round four strok… [+1931 chars]
